msg: Made Buildr::Application#load_* methods private, they should not be invoked by the user.
Moven gem runner logic into Util::Gem so that it can be reused by packaging/gems.rb

msg: Specs for Buildr::Application#load_* private methods and the order they should be run.

author: vborja
msg: Modified setup.rake:install_gem to fetch gem cache only once.
Use sudo if no Gem.path is writable.
